reviews.review: ESTA BUENARDO ES EL CS DE TOA LA VIDA
новый античит ничего не сделал, он только фпс забрал, а ещё только читеры на прайме играют

It's fun, but you really need to know how to play. Its not like most point and click FPS titles. There is an extreme learning curve coming from something like COD, or Destiny. I'd recommend to those style of gamers who want a challenge, and if your used to this kind of game, go for it for sure.
ENQUANTO ESSA MERDA DE VALVE FUDER O GAMER COM ESSAS CONTA SEM PRIME E ESSES XITERS FACIL DE USAR, O JOGO NO MODO COMPETITIVO VAI CONTINUAR A MERDA QUE É.
Не работающая ебань. Чтобы играть, нужно скачивать, какую-то сраную бету. Иначе актуальная версия не запускается.
pp doo doo toxic. very fun
Great game, love the experience of playing against players who were basically braindead people that were dogshit

Simplesmente um marco na história dos games, tanto em E-sport, competitivo e casual, muito balanceado e bem monetizado. Agora está frre-to-play mas comprei o meu na época que estava pago, esse jogo nunca perde a graça, às vezes para de jogar mas sempre acabo voltando pela boa sensação que o jogo passa, pé sólido e transparente.
el cs es una verga pero raramente me gusta el cs...
Great game, very much fun with full team! Would recommend buying prime tho!
Un shooter que se basa en un equipo y en habilidad propia. esta bueno pero la comunidad re toxic

With an unplayable community and broken mechanics...
This is always a problem with online games. that after a while they can no longer give you anything more. That feeling of toasting on the wall really bad. I played the game for 390 hours and I really feel like I wasted my time. But there is a different experience in each of the story games, the mechanics are constantly changing and the game drags you in their own worlds,but  I cannot find it in online games, nor can I find it.
I do not recommend this game if you agree with my review. i wish i tried different games instead of playing CS:GO for 390 hours..
3.7/10
CS:GO is a really fun game! It may be a few years old but it is just as fun as new games that have recently come out. I highly recommend it and I don't think you will be disappointed.
